p.strong:
LYNDEN SCHOOL DISTRICT CLOSED March 16th - April 24th
Due to Coronavirus

a.title: Meals During Extended Day Closure Information

a.title: Meals During Extended Day Closure Information
Informacion Sobre los Almuerzos Durante el Cierre Escolar
Informacion Sobre los Almuerzos Durante el Cierre Escolar

br.span: We will continue to update our families and staff during this time

span.style: font-size: 10pt; letter-spacing: 0.25pt; font-family: Arial, sans-serif; color: rgb(40, 40, 40);

p.span: Estimadas Familias y Empleados de Lynden

span.style: font-size: 10pt; letter-spacing: 0.25pt; font-family: Arial, sans-serif; color: rgb(40, 40, 40);

p.span: Durante los ltimos das, la propagacin del coronavirus ha causado un impacto significante en las comunidades y regiones. Las agencias pblicas del estado y nuestro centro de salud han recomendado disminuir la propagacin del virus practicando el distanciamiento social. Ejemplo: cancelar todas las reuniones grandes.

span.style: font-size: 10pt; letter-spacing: 0.25pt; font-family: Arial, sans-serif; color: rgb(40, 40, 40);

p.span: Hoy el departamento de salud del condado de Whatcom est recomendando el cierre de las escuelas. La escuela de Lynden seguir esta recomendacin y cerraremos nuestras escuelas iniciando el lunes 16 de Marzo hasta el 24 de abril. Todas las actividades deportivas, extra curriculares se cancelarn inmediatamente.

span.style: padding: 0in; border: 1pt none windowtext; color: rgb(24, 24, 24);

span.br:
There has been a great deal of discussion and communication between state, county, and local agencies and there are several good resources available for information about the current conditions in the state and county and how we can respond locally. The Whatcom County Health Department, Office of Superintendent of Public Instruction (OSPI), Washington State Department of Health, and Northwest ESD #189, are all very helpful.
Helpful Links for Further Information:

div.div:
1203 Bradley Road, Lynden, WA 98264
Phone 360-354-4443 | Fax 360-354-7662

div.p: Lynden School District does not discriminate in any programs or activities on the basis of sex, race, creed, religion, color, national origin, age, veteran or military status, sexual orientation, gender expression, gender identity, marital status, disability, or the use of a trained dog guide or service animal, and provides equal access to all youth groups identified in U.S.C., Title 36. The District has designated the following employees to handle questions and complaints of alleged discrimination: Civil Rights Compliance Coordinator Jim Frey (freyj@lynden.wednet.edu | 360-354-4443), and Title IX Officer and Section 504 Coordinator Tim Metz (metzt@lynden.wednet.edu | 360-354-2952). Address: 516 Main St., Lynden, WA 98264.
